channel.title: Dungeon World - The Sea of Glass
channel.description:
**Dungeon World - The Sea of Glass** 3 Sessions of Dungeon World in July.
What is The Sea of Glass?
![coral|400x500](upload://2ZCiRGk1vIfW1WBytnh7ib2tY79.jpeg)
Is it a smooth green ocean with no wind and currents to mar its mirror-perfect surface? Is it a vast desert, blasted by magical fire into an inhospitable wasteland of arching shards and sudden chasms? Perhaps it is a vast glacier with an ancient city, frozen but seemingly inaccessible, visible far below?
Let's find out together...I love to play a very collaborative form of Dungeon World, with lots of collaboration and shared world-building.
Come play with me :)
Session 1 - Tuesday, July 7th 2020, 7:00 pm (GMT+10) [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M7u_qf_68MM66t9Osnp](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com%2Fevent-detail%2F-M7u_qf_68MM66t9Osnp) Session 2 -Tuesday, July 14th 2020, 7:00 pm (GMT+10) [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M7ua4uxxcS9zzjCyIUT](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com%2Fevent-detail%2F-M7ua4uxxcS9zzjCyIUT) Session 3 - Tuesday, July 21st 2020, 7:00 pm [https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M7uaF0Gnpt2rgLhzlTB](https://slack-redir.net/link?url=https%3A%2F%2Fgauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com%2Fevent-detail%2F-M7uaF0Gnpt2rgLhzlTB)
We will begin with a CATS discussion (Concept, Aim, Tone and Safety),
the safety conversation will include Lines and Veils, and a discussion of the x-card.
I am also happy to discuss and integrate any safety tools that will make you feel safe,
or that will make you happy to have at the table (or both!).
Lu

item.dc:creator: @Lu.Quade
